bioAsHtml: Danny is a software engineer from NYC with 10 years experience in the field with an emphasis on Java/Groovy web applications. He is currently an active member of the Ratpack core team and actively contributions to Java/Groovy open source projects. He has spoken at Gr8Conf EU and in his free time enjoys geeking out about beer.
